backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor managing users, conversations, messages, calls, friendships, and authorization/storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old call sessions by adding isActive based on call status.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing call-related frontend files, components, and test IDs for two major call features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and layout resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component initializing local identity, onboarding, chat UI, and global call system providers.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Exports core branding strings for app name and tagline.
frontend/src/constants/buildInfo.ts: Defines a build identifier that updates each frontend build.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginView.tsx: Deprecated login screen kept for compatibility, displaying static branding.
frontend/src/features/auth/NameStartView: Onboarding view allowing users to set their display name and trigger completion callback.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallChip.tsx: Displays a minimized floating call control UI with mute, end, and restore actions and updates call status on the server.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallProvider: Provides context for managing active call state, mute/minimize controls, peer connection, and lifecycle cleanup.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallScreen.t: Implements the full call UI, handling local/remote media setup, WebRTC signaling, and backend call status updates.
frontend/src/features/calls/IncomingCall: Renders a modal dialog for incoming calls with accept and decline actions.
Polls for incoming calls, shows the incoming call dialog, and handles accepting or declining by setting up WebRTC and updating the backend.
frontend/src/features/calls/useCallSigna: Polls the backend for call session updates and notifies listeners of status, offer, or answer changes.
frontend/src/features/calls/useIncomingC: Periodically fetches pending incoming calls from the backend for detection and UI handling.
frontend/src/features/calls/useLocalMedi: Custom React hook managing audio/video acquisition, cleanup, and error handling. Provides media stream state and controls like toggling audio and cleanup.
frontend/src/features/calls/webrtc.ts: Utility functions to create and manage RTCPeerConnection, offers/answers, ICE gathering, and local/remote media streams.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatShell.tsx: Top-level chat layout managing conversation selection, new chat dialog, and rendering conversation list or message thread.
frontend/src/features/chat/ConversationL: Displays user conversations with unread indicators, selection handling, and per-conversation delete actions.
frontend/src/features/chat/FriendRequest: Empty placeholder file for a friend‑requests dialog.
frontend/src/features/chat/MessageCompos: Message input component supporting text, image upload with preview and progress, and sending messages to a conversation.
frontend/src/features/chat/MessageThread: Renders messages for a conversation, handles read status, auto-scroll, polling, and provides call-starting actions.
frontend/src/features/chat/NewChatDialog: Modal for searching users and starting new conversations, including filtering, loading states, and error toasts.
frontend/src/features/chat/time.ts: Utility functions to format timestamps into relative or readable message times.
frontend/src/features/chat/useMessagePol: Hook that periodically invalidates message and conversation queries to refresh data for an active conversation.
frontend/src/features/profile/AppInfoHel: Dialog showing app URL, copy functionality, cache‑busting reload, and update troubleshooting tips.
frontend/src/features/profile/ChangeDisp: Dialog for updating a user's display name with mutation handling and query invalidation.
frontend/src/features/profile/DisplayNam: Onboarding screen allowing new users to set and register a display name.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileMen: Profile menu with user initials, name display, and options for changing name or viewing app info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, loading saved identities, and tracking login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalActor.ts: Creates a backend actor using a locally generated identity and initializes access control with an admin token.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching conversations, messages, users, and performing messaging-related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme variables using OKLCH colors.
frontend/src/lib/localIdentity.ts: Manages generating, serializing, storing, loading, and clearing a local Ed25519 identity in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/localProfile.ts: Handles storing and clearing display name and onboarding state in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a classnames utility combining clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins using OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, listing known call-related issues, existing features, and pending feature requests focused on fixing WebRTC signaling and call lifecycle behavior.
